reviewDetails.comment: Dr. Rao is very poor with patient care and professionalism. Despite scheduling one of his first appointments on two occasions, he was 30 minutes late each time. He also mis-read my diagnosis (had mine confused with another persons file) and tried to cover-it-up when I called out that what he was reading was obviously not me. Dr. Rao is also very pushy, both medically and professionally. Medically, he tells you what to do despite clearly articulating his reasoning. He requested excessive tests (which I confirmed with a physician friend). Professionally, he is pushy; if he has high online reviews it's likely because he gives patients a paper ZocDoc review form mid-appointment, while he "leaves to take care of something" to give you time to fill it out. He'll waste your time, treat you rudely, and push you to high cost care to benefit himself. Stay away.

reviewDetails.comment: Very thorough and professional in her manner.  She also listens and tries to address all issues.

Dr. Schwartz was so welcoming, patient, listening and compassionate. She took the time to explain the procedure I had to go through, with so much humanity. My best medical appointment in many years.
I particularly recommend her should you need a gastroenterologist in NYC.
She takes the time necessary, takes detailed notes and refers to them in subsequent visits.  She's organized, good bedside manner, and much more important to me, knows her stuff!!

very knowledgeable, efficient, informative and excellent bedside manner.

i rate him a 10 out of 10

reviewDetails.comment: She was very easy to talk to and listened to the history of my illness before jumping to a conclusion or dimissing the problem like some physicians do.  She gave me the medication that eventually made me get well, and gave me other tips to help me feel better.
My visit with Dr. Grover was great. She listened to me and understood my concerns. She is very approachable, patient and caring. I highly recommend Dr. Grover!
Accommodating and professional, friendly and easy to talked with
